wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Thompson was a songwriter who co-wrote the song "The Thing-Ummy Bob" with David Heneker.

response: "The Thing-Ummy Bob" is a 1942 song which was written by Gordon Thompson and David Heneker which celebrates the production line worker of World War II making components for complex weapons to win the war.  Its chorus is
*Gordon Thompson (songwriter), songwriter who co-wrote "The Thing-Ummy Bob" with David Heneker
